CustomField.description:
Allows us to group guests with the member that brought them. For members, this will just be their Attendee_Code__c + '-A' (the "A" is just to ensure the main member is above his/her guests), and for guests/non-members we use their host's attendee number plus a "G" at the end to help with sorting so they appear below their host.
Marvin Sample (member) 18099-01-A Sally Sample (guest) 18099-01-G Bobby Sample (guest) 18099-01-G
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows us to group guests with the member that brought them.
CustomField.label: Primary Attendee Code
